name: Brain Blast Trainer
description:
Whether you'd like to improve your reaction time, your typing speed or your spatial cognition, this is a perfect tool to practice your skills.

This simple reaction game helps your hand eye coordination.

Press the button corresponding to the number displayed in the center of your screen to collect points. The faster you get the more points you'll collect. Keep on hitting your own performance limit and the app will reward you with extended time to play the game.

How many correct numbers can you press in the allotted time? Compare your record with the rest of the world in game center.


Have fun playing the Brain Blast Trainer and don't forget to challenge your friends to see who can achieve the highest score.


**********************************************************
WE SUPPORT OCCUPATIONAL THERAPISTS: If you're an OT simply send an email to apps@bidbox.com with the subject line "Brain Blast Trainer" and a short description of where you work to get a redemption code for this app.
**********************************************************
